comment._content: I remember my mom shouting out "Up Sligo!"  Now I know what she was talking about.  Thank you.  Great pic!

comment.author: 59774354@N00
comment._content: Since Kerry played Offaly in the All Ireland SFC final that year, I'm guessing that was the occasion here. Kerry won 0-10 to 0-07.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 79549245@N06
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/luctor_et_emergo] And the teams in the final were...

1969 - All Ireland Senior Football Championship - Kerry

J. Culloty (capt.), Seamus Murphy, P. O’Donoghue, S. Fitzgerald, T. Prendergast, M. Morris, M. O’Shea, M. O’Connell, D. J. Crowley, B. Lynch, P. Griffin, E. O’Donoghue, M. Gleeson, L. Higgins, M. O’Dwyer.

1969 - All Ireland Senior Football Championship - Offaly

M. Furlong, P. McCormack, G. Hughes, J. Egan (capt.), E. Mulligan, N. Clavin, M. Ryan, L. Coughlan, W. Bryan, P. Keenan, A. Hickey, A. McTague, S. Kilroy, S. Evans, J. Cooney. Subs: F. Costelloe for A. Hickey, K. Kilmurray for P. Keenan, P. Monaghan for S. Kilroy.

comment.author: 79549245@N06
comment._content:
The Minor Final was played on the same day between Cork and Derry, Cork won the day.

.1969 - All Ireland Minor Football Championship - Cork

B. O’Brien, P. Barry, G. B. O’Sullivan, D. Moloney, Brian Murphy, M. O’Doherty, C. Hartnett, E. Hallinan, J. Coleman, D. Curran, E. Fitzparick, H. O’Sullivan, J. Courtney, D. Barron, P. Lonergan.

1969 - All Ireland Minor Football Championship - Derry

K. McGahon, P. Burke, L. Murphy, P. McGuckian, B. Kearney, M. Moran, R. Hasson, E. Laverty, H. McGoldrick, S. Mullan, B. Ward, T. McWilliams, M. O’Neill, S. McGeehan, G. O’Neill. Subs: M. Bradley for T. McWilliams, S. Coyle for E. Lavery.

comment.author: 79549245@N06
comment._content: Date of the Matches was 28th September 1969 so your picture was taken on either the 27th or the 28th. I would guess early morning on the 28th.
